column4: I was directed to uninstall Network Manager while troubleshooting network issues how do I get it back now? I reinstalled it but it's icon doesn't appear
nm-applet is now running but no icon
right click on the panel and add Indicator Applet, that should put it back on the panel.
indicator applet is there already Banshee's icon is sitting in it
I'll try relogging in. Then I've got another odd issue be back in a sec
